betterquesting:10.desc:8:
While the substrate of Runandor is rich of Elecanium, this world's recursive substance, rarer traces of this other mineral are present.
By itself, it appears to do very little. And yet, I feel a latent power in its essence.
I just need to find a way to activate it in some way.
What is interesting about this substance is the almost intentional neglect from the people of Runandor. They do not just ignore it, they actively act as if it did not exist. That is strange and puzzling...
